# CI/CD Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show CI/CD status:

```markdown
[![CI/CD Pipeline](https://github.com/adrianco/the-goodies/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/adrianco/the-goodies/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/adrianco/the-goodies/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/adrianco/the-goodies)
```
